Leave Document
Settings To capture photos and videos, allow FilePicker access to your camera.\nTap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera on. To send media, allow FilePicker access to your device photos, media, and files.\nTap Settings > Permissions, and "Files and media" on. To call, allow FilePicker access to your microphone.\nTap Settings > Permissions, and turn Microphone on. Not Now
